name: Bell Guide and the Spooky Cave
name_original: Bell Guide and the Spooky Cave
description:
Use Headphones for better experience! Help Bell Guide, the blind monk, guiding him through a very dark cave, full of wicked creatures and other hazards, with the only help of his bell! Use the Monk's bell to throw some sound waves, to reveal what lies beneath your path, and find the exit! But beware of the many dangers that inhabit the cave, or you may never go out! A very simple, yet entertaining game, which can be played by anyone, anywhere, anytime!

A videogame designed for the Global Game Jam 2017 Edition. You can check the game page here: https://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/bell-guide-and-spooky-cave
